text: Taprang jih bandum pat nyang meureumpok Teuma tayue jak teubiet beu bagah Lagee gata dum ka jipeuteubiet Di jih meunan cit bek le takeubah Teuma fiteunah leupah that saket Tacang ngon tatop hana that parah Bek taprang jih lam Masjidil Haram Meu kon ka jiprang gata jigagah Teuma meu jiprang gata di sinan Gata pih yoh nyan jeut jih tagagah Meunan keuh balah keu bandum kaphe
